newsitem.title: GREECE: ING Barings launches Athens-based research office.
newsitem.headline: ING Barings launches Athens-based research office.

text.p: ING Barings Greece EPE, the newly established Athens-based office of ING Baring Securities will be researching Athens stock exchange listed companies and issue recommendations on Greek equities to international institutional investors.
ING Baring Securities is a subsidiary of ING Group whose subsidiaries provide a wide range of financial services in Greece including insurance, fund management and banking.

"ING Baring Securities was the first international stockbroker to cover Greek equities in the late 80s. The formation of its Athens-based office marks a decade of continued commitment to Greece," ING Baring said.
"It is in line with the firm's philosophy to provide in-depth research from on-site offices in emerging markets."
The office will be headed by analyst Yiannis Protopapadakis.
ING Barings has headquarters in London, Hong Kong and New York.

It also has offices in Bangkok, Bogota, Bratislava, Budapest, Buenos Aires, Geneva, Istanbul, Jakarta, Johannesburg, Karachi, Kuala Lumpur, Lima, Mexico City, Mumbai, Osaka, Paris, Prague, San Fransisco, Santiago, Sao Paulo, Seoul, Shanghai, singapore, Taipei and Tokyo.
